about_us_text:
Identity Wind is a forward-thinking digital agency specializing in impactful, results-driven design and marketing solutions. Since 2022, we've helped brands express their identity and connect with audiences through high-quality graphic design.

Starting September 2025, we’re expanding our capabilities to offer a full suite of digital services, including:

Web Design & Development

Digital Marketing Strategy

Google SEO (Search Engine Optimization)

Google Ads & Paid Advertising Campaigns

We don’t just create — we build brands that grow. Whether it's shaping visual identities, designing high-converting websites, or launching data-driven marketing campaigns, we deliver solutions tailored to your business goals.

What sets us apart is our expert team, with most members bringing 5 to 8+ years of professional experience in their fields. We’re designers, developers, strategists, and marketers united by a passion for quality, creativity, and performance.

At Identity Wind, we believe great brands aren’t just seen — they’re remembered. And we're here to help you make a lasting impression in the digital world.

Let’s shape your identity. Let’s move with the wind.
who_we_are_text:
At Identity Wind, we are a team of passionate creatives, strategists, and digital experts dedicated to helping brands stand out in a crowded digital world.

Founded in 2022, we began our journey as a graphic design-focused agency, committed to delivering visually stunning and meaningful designs. As our clients' needs evolved, so did we. Today, we are growing into a full-service digital agency, offering not only graphic design, but also web design, digital marketing, Google SEO, and paid ad services — launching officially in September 2025.

We are proud to have a team of seasoned professionals, many with 5 to 8+ years of industry experience. Each member brings deep expertise, creativity, and a results-driven mindset to the table. We work collaboratively, combining design excellence with smart marketing strategies to help your brand grow, engage, and lead.

More than a service provider, we’re your creative partner — here to help you build a strong, lasting identity and reach your digital potential.
